author: cms-sw
body:
- simplify hls patches
- Replace enum with `static constexpr` to avoid [warnings like](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/logreader/el8_amd64_gcc12/CMSSW_14_1_X_2024-07-22-2300/pyRelValMatrixLogs/run/29634.702_TTbar_14TeV+2026D110_trackingMkFitPhase2/step3_TTbar_14TeV+2026D110_trackingMkFitPhase2.log#/)
```
In file included from DataFormatsL1TrackTrigger_xr dictionary payload:73:
In file included fromDataFormats/L1TrackTrigger/interface/TTTypes.h:19:
In file included from DataFormats/L1TrackTrigger/interface/TTTrack.h:18:
In file included from DataFormats/L1TrackTrigger/interface/TTTrack_TrackWord.h:20:
In file included from hls/2019.08-0e37f055a3ed22611ce5edecb14d0695/include/ap_int.h:20:
In file included from hls/2019.08-0e37f055a3ed22611ce5edecb14d0695/include/ap_common.h:252:
hls/2019.08-0e37f055a3ed22611ce5edecb14d0695/include/etc/ap_private.h:4550:58: warning: arithmetic between different enumeration types ('ap_private<128, false, false>::(unnamed enum at hls/2019.08-0e37f055a3ed22611ce5edecb14d0695/include/etc/ap_private.h:3025:3)' and 'ap_private<128, false, false>::(unnamed enum at hls/2019.08-0e37f055a3ed22611ce5edecb14d0695/include/etc/ap_private.h:3160:3)') is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-anon-enum-enum-conversion]
    if (this != &RHS) memcpy(pVal, RHS.get_pVal(), _AP_N * APINT_WORD_SIZE);

```
title: hls: avoid arithmetic between different enumeration types
